name: Draugr Corrupt
description:
Draugr Corrupt handles all the "administration" when it comes to playing Todd Sanders' solo micro-game. Select the Draugr you are playing with and start. The Draugr causing corruption and the associated corruption symbols are shown. If you need to pay tithe to Lord Molton or Lady Bethane, that is shown as well. Tap Next Turn and get a new set of corruption.

Can you save the village?
